data.actual_result: It does update only in profile, member list still displays the old status
data.expected_result: Playing status should update retroactively in both member list and in profile
data.short_description: Playing status doesn't update in member list, only in profile, causing it to show two different statuses in different places
data.steps_to_repro: - Start Discord - Find someone in a server with Playing status set - Have him change the text of his Playing status - Observe member list & profile of the user
